name: The Tale of Ariadne (DEMO Ver.)
description:
This is a demo and not meant to be representative of the final product. Project made for the METAFAB 2D SHOOTOUT jam. All assets used in this project are either provided from the Unity Assets Store or licensed under free copyright. In case of dispute, please contact me for resolution. 

Game info:

Showcasing proof of concept. Basic gameplay mechanic has been implemented. I would have liked to have introduced progression trees, an item system and a currency system, however this was not possible under a time crunch.

Enemy health bars  were only implemented for large enemy types, not for simple NPCs. 

Sound effects were not added for enemies. the environment and actions of the player with the exception of a grunt when rolling. 

The bow of Despair - A gift from Minos. 

Triton - The Son of the Sea God Poseidon. 

Karkinos - Giant crab monster who inhabits the wildlands.
